attributes.action: Make the e-petition website more accountable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recently, the administrators of the e-petions website, have been rejecting valid political petitions (i.e Tony Blair and appointments in the EU) while allowing frivilous ones (Jeremy Clarkson for PM).

This shows that those unelected appointees in charge of the website are interferring with the democratic process. This interference should be stopped.

rejection.details:
Your petition contains unsubstantiated claims.
Comments on the e-petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
